task.title: How to center your text in a Microsoft Word document.
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to center your text in a Microsoft Word document.

prereq.p: Your Word Application have to be installed on your device and you have to have a Microsoft Word document on which you can work on.

context.p: This task can help you make your text more readable.
This task can also help you make the text to look better structured.

step.cmd: Select the text which you want to center on the page.

result.p: The selected text is centered on the page successfully!

example.p: You can center your text when you want to make it more readable for the reader.
